dempred.classifier

Class AbstractLinearClassifier<T extends Datapoint>

  • java.lang.Object
    • dempred.classifier.AbstractLinearClassifier<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the generic type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClassifierInterface<T>, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RidgeRegressionPrimal, WrapperPrimal

    public abstract class AbstractLinearClassifier<T extends Datapoint>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClassifierInterface<T>, java.io.Serializable
    This is an abstract class of a linear learner.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • effectObjFunc

        public final FVector effectObjFunc(Dataset<T> dataset)
        Calculates the effect of every single feature on the objective function. the larger the value the more importand the feature.
        Parameters:
        dataset - the dataset
        Returns:
        a vector containing a value representing the importance of each value...

      • effectObjRetrain

        public final FVector effectObjRetrain(Dataset<T> dataset)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Calculates the effect of every single feature on the objective function. the larger the value the more importand the feature. This function retrains the classifier for every single feature and hence is computational quite expensive...
        Parameters:
        dataset - the dataset
        Returns:
        the f vector
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception

      • effectObjRetrain

        public final FVector[] effectObjRetrain(Dataset<T> trainset,
                         Dataset<T> testset)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Calculates the effect of every single feature on the objective function. the larger the value the more importand the feature. This function retrains the classifier for every single feature and hence is computational quite expensive...
        Parameters:
        trainset - the trainset
        testset - the testset
        Returns:
        the f vector[]
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception
